name: Jquery-navigation-state
tagline: Set your navigation state when your navigation HTML is cached.
body:
# jQuery Navigation State Set your navigation state when your navigation HTML is cached. ## Install ### Bower ``` $ bower install jquery-navigation-state ``` ### Plain old simple include ``` ``` ## How to use This plugin adds the class "active" to an element if it's data attributes matches the list on . ### HTML ```html
Products About
Cookies Milk
``` ### Javascript ```javascript $(function() { new NavigationState(); }); ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
